name: PathTrainSchedule
0:
”Alexa, ask path next, When is the next train from newport to world trade center”
”Alexa, ask path next, when is the next train”
”Alexa, ask path next, to list path stations”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: path next
des:
This skill helps users in knowing the next scheduled PATH train from a particular PATH route station.

User can say "Alexa, ask path next when is my next train from Newport to World Trade Center" or "Alexa, ask path next to list path stations"

This skill is not sponsored or endorsed by The Port Authority of NY & NJ
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
